scripts.start: AGENTS=${AGENTS:-2} BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(get-port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(get-port) npm run network
scripts.network: hc sandbox clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=$(get-port) concurrently "npm run start --workspace ui" "npm run launch:happ"
scripts.tool-dev: npm run build:happ && concurrently "UI_PORT=8888 npm run start --workspace ui" "weave --agent-idx 1 --dev-config ./weave.dev.config.ts" "sleep 5 && weave --agent-idx 2 --dev-config ./weave.dev.config.ts --sync-time 6000"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm run test --workspace tests
scripts.start:tauri: AGENTS=${AGENTS:-2} BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(get-port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(get-port) npm run network:tauri
scripts.network:tauri: hc sandbox clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=$(get-port) concurrently "npm run start --workspace ui" "npm run launch:tauri"
scripts.launch:tauri: concurrently "hc run-local-services --bootstrap-port $BOOTSTRAP_PORT --signal-port $SIGNAL_PORT" "echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/generic-dna.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:"$SIGNAL_PORT""
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package --workspace ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
